name: 3 Cubes: Puzzle Block Match
description:
Elegant, minimalistic delivery in both form and function.
3 Cubes is a fresh take on a classic Match-3. Identify the patterns, adapt to various intriguing game modes, match the cubes and test yourself in numerous carefully designed levels!

GAME FEATURES:
• Challenging game modes
• Intriguing Enigma stages
• Discreet, minimalistic graphics
• Numerous game-changing power-ups
• Easy to learn but hard to master gameplay

Go ahead and match the Cubes!
publishers: GAMEZAUR GAMES KUCMA WILCZYNSKI SPOŁKA JAWNA
